basics.description: **Azure Sentinel All-In-One** deployment, see more information about this project [here](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/Tools/Sentinel-All-In-One/).

basics.name: workspaceName
basics.label: Workspace Name
basics.toolTip: The workspace name should include 4-63 letters, digits or '-'. The '-' shouldn't be the first or the last symbol.

constraints.validationMessage: Only alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-30 characters long.

basics.name: dailyQuota
basics.label: Daily ingestion limit in GBs. Enter 0 for no limit.
basics.toolTip: This limit doesn't apply to the following tables: SecurityAlert, SecurityBaseline, SecurityBaselineSummary, SecurityDetection, SecurityEvent, WindowsFirewall, MaliciousIPCommunication, LinuxAuditLog, SysmonEvent, ProtectionStatus, WindowsEvent

elements.name: enableDataConnectorsKind
elements.label: Select data connectors to onboard
elements.toolTip: Select the data connectors that you would like to enable

elements.name: mcasDiscoveryLogs
elements.label: Enable MCAS Discovery Logs?
elements.toolTip: Select to bring MCAS discovery logs into Sentinel. These logs are billed.

elements.name: securityCollectionTier
elements.label: Security Events to stream into Sentinel

elements.name: enableFusionAlert
elements.label: Enable Fusion alert rule?
elements.toolTip: Select to enable Fusion analyttic rule. Details here: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/fusion

elements.name: enableMicrosoftAlerts
elements.label: Enable Microsoft alert rules for selected connectors?
elements.toolTip: Select to enable Microsoft rules for the connectors you selected in the previous step.

elements.name: enableMLAlerts
elements.label: Enable ML Behavior Analytics alert rules?
elements.toolTip: Select to enable ML Behavior Analytics rules for selected connectors (SecurityEvents and/or Syslog)

elements.name: enableScheduledAlerts
elements.label: Enable Scheduled alert rules for selected connectors?
elements.toolTip: Select to enable scheduled analytics rules for selected connectors
